combinedopenended.markdown:
[prompt]

Answer the questions in the response field. Put your lab code at the top of the response field. Quizzes without a lab code will not be graded.

[prompt] [rubric] + Q1 - 0 - test 1 - test 2 - test 3 - correct + Q2 - Incorrect - Correct: "(whatever the correct answer was)" + Q3 - Incorrect - Correct: "(whatever the correct answer was)" + Q4 - Incorrect - Correct: "(whatever the correct answer was)" [rubric] [tasks] (AI) [tasks]

prompt.p: Answer the questions in the response field. Put your lab code at the top of the response field. Quizzes without a lab code will not be graded.
